Test Name: BEETS (BEETROOT) and Immunoglobulin E (IgE) Serum Analysis
Specimen Type: Serum (BEETS can also use plasma or whole blood)
Purpose: To quantify beetroot-related analytes and serum IgE, providing accurate and reliable results for clinical evaluation.
Container: Not specified (standard serum/plasma collection tube implied)
Equipment: Centrifuge, spectrophotometer or HPLC, ELISA plate reader, micropipettes
